text: Katharsis may refer to: * Catharsis or katharsis, a Greek word meaning "cleansing" or "purging" * Katharsis (journal), an Israeli periodical * Katharsis, one of the members of the fictional rogue team The Disgraced * Katharsis (video game), a 1997 Polish action game ==Music== * Katharsis (band), a German black metal band * Katharsis (album), a 1976 album by Czesław Niemen * "Katharsis", a song by Doda from Diamond Bitch * "Katharsis", a song by Tōru "TK" Kitajima == See also == * Catharsis (disambiguation)
title: Katharsis
